website_summaries.verdict: Kaspersky Anti-Virus 2009 provides adequate protection, but the program itself could use some work in telling the user what's going on.
pros: Kaspersky Anti-Virus 2009 includes a fast malicious software engine, Secunia vulnerability database, and built-in system restore capabilities
cons: Kaspersky Anti-Virus 2009 results messages were unclear, installation could have been a lot smoother, leaves behind registry file after uninstall

customer_reviews.title: Nice Anti-Virus Product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Kaspersky Anti-Virus 2009 after my Internet Security program of the same brand expired. I had read better reviews on this software and decided to give it a try. Now after having it installed on my system for a couple months, I can fairly and honestly say I prefer this product over the later. My system runs faster and smoother to the point you can't even tell you have an anti-virus software installed. That is until you venture into troubled waters, then it responds like you'd expect and easily handles the situation without a miss. I'm sold on this version, so unless they mess it up, I'll certainly renew my product next year. I rate this 4.0 Stars
customer_reviews.author: Big-D

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't slow down the computer...
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend Kaspersky over McAfee and Norton. I've used all three products and Kaspersky is the only one that has not slowed down my computer and still be effective. However, I did have an issue with the program in August 2008. The product completely stopped working and my PC Tools Spyware Doctor program caught the virus before it spread, but it originate from Kaspersky. THe product works but customer service needs some major work.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Apollo

customer_reviews.title: Kaspersky Installation CD
customer_reviews.text: Item took almost a month ro receive, no fault of the seller, it was mailed promptly. It arrived cracked and non-functional, careful packing may have prevented this. I contacted seller, he said just download the same program free from the Net. This resulted in a 30 day trial from Kaspersky, which I didn't purchase. All in all it was a bad experience and I wouldn't buy from this seller again. He never once offered a return of my purchase price.
customer_reviews.author: John N. Carr

customer_reviews.title: A very good product, but not easy to use -- at least at first
customer_reviews.text: The Kaspersky is a very good antivirus. I bought it because a friend recommended it as the best antivirus at present. I have only had it about a week, but I can say this much: It can be hard to install. For example, I had previously had the Panda and the AVG. I had uninstalled the Panda but the AVG was so hard to uninstall I had to have it done. Then the Kaspersky is a bit old-fashioned; you have to do a lot of rebooting. Luckily I had read other reviews and did NOT uninstall the Ad-Aware, because it erases all the spyware the Kaspersky does not eliminate.
customer_reviews.author: Maria C.

customer_reviews.title: I like kaspersky. This time was a waste thoughm
customer_reviews.text: Didn't use it right away. When I tried to install, I got a message that it had expired.
customer_reviews.author: George Costanza

customer_reviews.title: A Very Good Product.
customer_reviews.text: When I saw the ad in the magazine about how Kaspersky Anti-Virus won't slow your computer down, I was ready to try. I have been running Norton's for years, and always have had a very slow boot-up time, and some of my programs were affected as well. Since I have installed this product, I have not noticed any conflict with my programs, especially "Studio 9". I also have cut my boot-up time in half. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: J. G. Mckinnis

customer_reviews.title: Never going back to Symantec
customer_reviews.text: Kaspersky is simple effective program that only makes it self known when it needs to be. I think its faster, simpler and better than Norton. Give it a try and you'll never go back. The only think is its cheaper to buy a new disk from amazon every year than to update the program electronically
customer_reviews.author: Mike W.

customer_reviews.title: I Finally found a good antivirus program
customer_reviews.text: I use Kaspersky Antivirus 2009 and it works well for me. I don't notice any slowdown and I never get any annoying pop ups asking for permissions like some antivirus programs. Actually I noticed my computer started a lot quicker after switching from using Zone Alarm, one of worst antivirus suites out there. I'm using kaspersky on a core 2 duo with 4 gigs of ram, On windows Vista 32 bit. I don't know how it runs on other systems but it works on mine. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Jader88

customer_reviews.title: Easy and Fast to laod
customer_reviews.text: i bought this in replacement of my norton which really gives my system a boost. not only keeps my system virus-free but also don't clog my start-up. after my subscription expires next year i will still choose kaspersky than any other Anti-virus out there available.
customer_reviews.author: Stingray

customer_reviews.title: ...fine
customer_reviews.text: ...don't understand it ...I don't ask or answer any questions, ...I just leave it to do what it does, ...my computer is still going and it was cheaper on Amazon then anywhere else! ...much better than Norton or Macfee, they make you think that they really saved your [...] but didn't! ...wish I could get this spell checker to work???
customer_reviews.author: uster Tennison

customer_reviews.title: Great Anti-Virus !!
customer_reviews.text: Kaspersky A-V 2009 is great. After removing the old version, this new one loaded with no problems at all. The new format is easy to use, and doesn't slow your computer down like "other" anti-viruses do...I like it!
customer_reviews.author: Frank Z.

customer_reviews.title: It was not Kaspersky program, but the shell. ...
customer_reviews.text: It was not Kaspersky program, but the shell... Who needs the shell if you can buy it straight from Kaspersky. Very misleading ad.
customer_reviews.author: Shopping Wizard

customer_reviews.title: great protection
customer_reviews.text: no complaints of this software. protected my pc very well. i would recommend it. i'm a avid kaspersky user. great deal
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy - NO STARS
customer_reviews.text: FYI - this product would not install. Software telling me that I needed to remove software that never existed on the computer . . .hours of time wasted and had to return to seller for refund.
customer_reviews.author: J Galt

customer_reviews.title: Kaspersky Anti-Virus 2009
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best anti-virus,anti-spyware,anti-fishing and firewall product I have ever used and I have used the best known, such as Norton and McAfee. Virus scan is extremely fast and efficient. It has a great firewall that keeps unwanted intrusion off your computer. I recommend this product over anything on the market, hands-down!
customer_reviews.author: Cas2020

customer_reviews.title: User friendly product.
customer_reviews.text: I'm not exactly a computer geek, even so I had no problem installing it properly. I feel my computer is truly protected with this anti-virus, works nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Kattia

customer_reviews.title: 2nd time buying this product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the 2008 version for my other PC and wanted this for my new laptop. This is a great product. I had other anti-virus software (Norton - can't stand it, takes over my system; McAfee - don't use it except at work) but someone turned me onto this product and it's been great. Isn't very intrusive, at least from what I can tell, and doesn't lock my PC or laptop up like Norton always did.
customer_reviews.author: D. Munchel

customer_reviews.title: why bother ?
customer_reviews.text: Why bother. Microsoft essentials is free, backed by microsoft and doesn't slow your computer down. Kapersky worked well and was high rated, but again why bother?
customer_reviews.author: johnnymonn

customer_reviews.title: Always buy Kapersky
customer_reviews.text: I'm totally happy with this software. I've had it before (as recommended by Consumer Reports) and will still only buy Kapersky. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Janet L. Mcmillan

customer_reviews.title: Not a system hog
customer_reviews.text: This software is not a system resource hog. It appears to perform exactly as expected with no discernable intrusions. It simply works in the background. The only time I have ever known it was there is when it found a virus or some other kind of malware. Top marks to Kaspersky! It is simply the best anti-virus software I have ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: jam_2018

customer_reviews.title: WORKS GOOD, but...
customer_reviews.text: This anti-virus program works very good to stop those idiots on the web from messing up ones computer. It does have its drawbacks though. It will slow down the computer, and it has pop-ups that continue to annoy one when using the web. The price here on Amazon was the best I could find for this item.
customer_reviews.author: Slim Smithie

customer_reviews.title: Kaspersky AntiVirus 2009 is great!
customer_reviews.text: The Kaspersky Anti-virus 2009, and Kaspersky products in general, are great against virus. Since I've ordered the product, I haven't had any computer problems. However, once the anti-virus expires, it is imperative to purchase or upgrade the package, otherwise your computer will be vulnerable to newer viruses. My computer was infected exactly two months after the software expired. I would recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Joe N. Stroman

customer_reviews.title: Best Anti-Virus ever
customer_reviews.text: Tried them all and download a lot of stuff. Has stoped all the Viruses I have ran into and trojans with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: William Foutch

customer_reviews.title: No updates available
customer_reviews.text: This version is obsolete and will not provide updates. You will need a new version 2014 to receive any kind of support.
customer_reviews.author: WE

customer_reviews.title: Silent Power
customer_reviews.text: So far, that said two months of use of the product since I purchased it, I am completely satisfied. It looks like running automatically without my intervention and keeps everything outside my computer's borders. It acts like a deterrent.I think so! It is the ultimate threat to external theats.
customer_reviews.author: Aristotle

customer_reviews.title: Best Anti-virus program
customer_reviews.text: Program runs very quiet and detects viruses, malware, cookies, and more. Every few days I do a full scan and program detects over 1000 problems that it corrects.
customer_reviews.author: S. Allen

customer_reviews.title: Best Buy for Premium Protection
customer_reviews.text: I've been using Kaspersky for the past two years and found that it is an excellent anti-virus program. So I had no qualms in trying the new Kaspersky Anti-virus 2009. In addition to being an anti-virus program, it also offers maximum protection against spyware, adware, trojans and worms. Plus it has advanced proactive protection, does not slow down your system, even when actively scanning, has free technical support and free automatic hourley updates. I installed it on my Vista laptop and it was a painless installation. It's recommended by C/Net, PCWorld, Consumer Reports, and Computer Shopper. And at Amazon's unbeatable price, it's a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: bovanity

customer_reviews.title: Offers little more than the free versions available
customer_reviews.text: I found little in Kaspersky Anti-Virus to make it worth the money. One can easily download the AVG freeware or, better yet, sign up for Microsoft's free Security Essentials and be done with worrying about a virus. I've been in this business since the beginning - building my first computer from a magazine article while a graduate student in 1973. I've used the Norton, McAfee, AVG and Microsoft's Security Essentials software and probably others that I cannot remember. They each offer an automatic update feature and I've never suffered viral damage. If one is free, and the others cost, the choice decision seems easy!
customer_reviews.author: Lee Mairs

customer_reviews.title: Nice AV app
customer_reviews.text: I've always loved Kaspersky because it's one of the fastest AV software you can get in Windows. Being profession in IT, I've used several other software or hardware based AV solutions. Kaspersky is one of the best and cost is very reasonable. I would recommend Kaspersky over Norton or even Macafee. The key when you buy any AV software is to look in their website whether they have their own AV database. I use other enterprise level AV solution such as Fortinet which is the best enterprise grade AV solution but it's not cheap. Buy Kaspersky when it's on sale, you won't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Yesuaini99

customer_reviews.title: Well Respected But Incompatible.
customer_reviews.text: Kapersky is respected as an affordable alternative to sluggish and higher-priced programs by Norton and McAfee. Unfortunately, I was not able to get this edition to install onto our upgraded computers. It got the job done on a Vista system, and I had no detected viruses, slow downs, or other problems while it ran on the test computer. Of course, I don't open spam, follow suspicious links, or visit questionable websites, which helps to cut down on the malware. It is not compatible with Windows 7, and there isn't anything especially exciting about this package, hence 3 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Brian M. Ranzoni

customer_reviews.title: Mostly Invisible
customer_reviews.text: Installing Kaspersky was mostly uneventful, however, it did require me to uninstall Spybot first (which seemed strange to me -- but not as strange as Spybot's response to being uninstalled). During the installation it did an update which took roughly an hour. After that, it bacame mostly invisible. I haven't noticed any performance issues, and have been been pleased with this product. I cannot say how well it is working, because there has been no virus alerts. I can say that it is mostly invisible and I like that.
customer_reviews.author: barbre

customer_reviews.title: One of the best anti-viruses I've ever used
customer_reviews.text: I enjoyed installing Kaspersky, but I really enjoyed how it worked. It has an indicator telling me how my PC is running, the overall speed and how many updates are available. I was cleaning out my PC to find multiple Trojans and pieces of spy ware that Norton could not find. I recommend it for all techs, home users alike. What makes it really interesting is the fix it now capability. Please give it a go and you will not be dissatisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Groovin' guy

customer_reviews.title: Does not meet my needs
customer_reviews.text: It's hard to find decent anti-virus software that provides solid protection without slowing down your PC so much that it affects the performance. I've tried Norton, McAfee, and several free anti-virus software options, but they had clunky interfaces, were too intrusive, and/or put an excessive load on system resources. After installing this and seeing the performance hit that my PC took, I uninstalled it and went back to AVG Free. The interface was OK, but I'm not willing to sacrifice my system's speed in order to get a higher level of protection against viruses. I'm not saying it's a bad product, but it did not meet my needs.
customer_reviews.author: pm444

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: I used this program on a computer that had MacAffee suite on it. It found and took care of some nasties that were lurking in the shadows. It was easy enough to download onto computer and use and hasn't been an issue since I put it on the computer. I've found that MacAffee doesn't always do a good job. So, if you're looking for an adjunct program, or one to take the place of a program, you really should consider this one. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Stanton

customer_reviews.title: Free Support if you can find them.
customer_reviews.text: From the moment this software downloaded onto my computer I've had nothing but problems. No phone # available on package, left message with their online service-which they promised via email to respond to within 48 hours, I am still waiting. I uninstalled it after 8 days and loaded McAfee, most problems resolved. Kaspersky is so arrogant they think they don't need to REALLY provide support because their product is perfect. I have a new rule, no support phone # on the box, no purchase.....and I may even call the number, before purchasing....to see if they really answer. This Anti-virus may work for some but you better not need help from Kaspersky.
customer_reviews.author: Jonny

customer_reviews.title: Great Protection and Price
customer_reviews.text: This maximum security spyware assures security against hijacking and identity theft. It also protects against viruses and worms and blocks malware and phishing sites. It doesn't slow down the computer. The reasonable price for this protection should also be considered. I found it easy to install and use. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: an honest reviewer

customer_reviews.title: No Frills Anti-Virus
customer_reviews.text: This seems like a no frills anti-virus solftware. The installation on Windows XP was simple. Not much hassle with any settings. The only dicosmfort is the updates: Kaspersky's site is unbelievably slow, or it appears this way; hence, the it takes forever to complete the updates. Hence 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: uniq

customer_reviews.title: Kapersky Anti-Virus 2009
customer_reviews.text: Over the years, I have tried many different anti-virus products. I chose this one because Kapersky seems to be the standard for anti-virus protection! This program installed seamlessly and worked as it was expected.
customer_reviews.author: JanFlorida

customer_reviews.title: Easy Installation, Strong Protection, Better Than Better-Known Competitors
customer_reviews.text: Kaspersky Anti-Virus 2009 provides strong protection against computer viruses and malware. It is easy to install and has a friendly interface. Unlike some better-known competitors, there are no software tentacles locking you into this software.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kaspersky is a great product and buy.
customer_reviews.text: Kaspersky is in my opinion as good as any anti-virus software out there. I love the interface and it seems to cover everything that some other well known software companies don't. This was also a great place to buy the software. 5 Star.
customer_reviews.author: Game Lover

customer_reviews.title: Best antivirus so far
customer_reviews.text: I have used for a long time Norton Antivirus which in last years become just a ineffective hug for my PC, it just couldn't detect infected files which online scanners detect, then I switched to Eset Nod32 is better with memory and CPU usage but still is not good at detecting some of the viruses in the wild, finally I tried Kaspersky which made all the difference in the world low CPU and memory usage, detects viruses not previously detected with Norton or Nod32, best experience so far hope they will keep up with good work.
customer_reviews.author: Oleg Ursu

customer_reviews.title: Smooth load
customer_reviews.text: Thanks to other reviewers, I made sure all firewalls turned off and removed anything that was McAfee. Kaspersky loaded quickly and smoothly with no issues. I am so pleased with how quickly Kaspersky does what it needs to do when I boot up every morning. With McAfee it was at least 10 minutes before I had control of my notebook. Trying to get into my browser while McAfee was updating.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Welch

customer_reviews.title: Kaspersky Anti-Virus 2009
customer_reviews.text: I've used Kaspersky since the last version with out issue. Installed on a Averatec XP laptop, Compaq XP desktop and an HP Vista desktop. Rated #1 in some reviews. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: AZLee

customer_reviews.title: inexpensive
customer_reviews.text: This is the best so far for me and not expensive to buy. So far so good It seems to have everything for being an anti-virus softwear it help my computer with malware spywear trojans it took them away.
customer_reviews.author: Val R.

customer_reviews.title: It did not give me enough information
customer_reviews.text: First it came pretty quick which is great, however it did not tell you if the product is valid for one year or three. Well I found out that it was valid for one year only which is still ok. But what bothered me the most is when I got it I found that the product will expire in 9 months ONLY not even a full year.
customer_reviews.author: A. Gift For You

customer_reviews.title: The best antivirus software
customer_reviews.text: Kaspersky Antivirus 2009 is the best antivirus software for portable and home computers. * easy to install * user interface * huge virus database * great results
customer_reviews.author: Georgia -

customer_reviews.title: Kaspersky Anti-Virus 2009
customer_reviews.text: No problems setting up at all! Just make sure all other anti-virus software is off, or better yet, deleted, plus turn off your firewall and install. Very simple, works great!
customer_reviews.author: Christina A. Danner

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my laptop the I just recently purchased for college. Installation was really easy, despite any complaints in that nature. It seems to be working great, alerting me whenever an update is necessary.
customer_reviews.author: John Stuligross

customer_reviews.title: This software is living hell, it will make you depressed
customer_reviews.text: I swear, nothing in my life has upset me as much as this software. It take 20 minutes to install, and then it slows down your computer tremendously! It makes my computer work like a MS-DOS PC. It doesn't protect you at all! Worst of all, it wont update. It did the same update about 37 times for me before I uninstalled. It had a pop-up every 20 seconds and the software is the ugliest thing in the world. If you buy this, I would say you will be miserable for at least a week. I am...
customer_reviews.author: B. Bildsten

customer_reviews.title: License expires in 1 year
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your time on this. The license expires in one year and then you have to buy the extension. This is not mentioned anywhere on the website or the package. I am switching to a different vendor. - Supra
customer_reviews.author: S. Maitra

customer_reviews.title: Kaspersky Anti-Virus 2009
customer_reviews.text: I've had Norton anti-virus for years and after Kaspersky was installed it made my computer start up much faster. It takes out many things Norton leaves behind.
customer_reviews.author: David W. Champine

customer_reviews.title: Not a resource hog
customer_reviews.text: We have used Norton and CA products. Both were huge resource hogs. Our computers run much faster with Kaspersky AV than Norton or CA. We are very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne A. Franklin

customer_reviews.title: Watch out
customer_reviews.text: Watch out when you get a message asking if you want to delete something. Because of this "feature" I deleted a Windows system file. This program is not as user friendly as it could be.
customer_reviews.author: John Collins

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: Saved quite a bit of money and had no problem with activation code. I'm very happy with this purchase. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: rainstorm1004

product_meta.title: Kaspersky Anti-Virus 2009 [OLD VERSION]
product_meta.description:
AMAZON.COM
With a new, super-fast and efficient anti-virus engine, Kaspersky Anti-Virus raises the bar for traditional anti-virus protection from all types of malicious programs. You can be confident that your computer and your confidential information are safe as you work and surf the internet. 

Kaspersky Anti-Virus raises the bar for traditional anti-virus protection from all types of malicious programs. 

Scans files, email messages and Internet traffic. Click to enlarge. 

Scans operating system and installed application for vulnerabilities. Click to enlarge. 

The navigation bar provides quick access to the application's functions, including anti-virus scans and updating tasks. 

Protects Your PC From:


 * Viruses and worms 
 * Spyware and trojans 
 * Hijacking and botnets 
 * Identity theft and phishing 

Kaspersky Users are Making the Smart Choice
People have challenged the Anti-Malware industry. Application incompatibilities and slow performance are simply not acceptable. Meanwhile, the alarming growth in cybercrime is making the Internet an increasingly dangerous place to work and play. A new approach is needed. 

Kaspersky Anti-Virus 2009 is designed specifically to meet these challenges.
Improving on our previous award-winning products we've fully integrated a revolutionary new mix of technology designed to provide the highest level of protection possible against cybercriminals. Up to 7x faster than prior versions, Kaspersky Anti-Virus 2009 empowers you to harness the power of the Internet, without the constant worry of identity theft and malicious attacks that hijack your computer. And Kaspersky has drastically improved performance. 

Faster and safer without getting in your way. It's the smart choice. 

KASPERSKY ANTI-VIRUS 2009 PROVIDES THE NECESSARY TOOLS FOR PROTECTING YOUR PC. AN EASY-TO-USE INTERFACE DRIVES A COMPREHENSIVE APPROACH TO PROTECTING INFORMATION.
Essential Protection


 * Protects from viruses, Trojans and worms. 
 * Blocks spyware and adware. 
 * Scans files, email messages and Internet traffic. 
 * Protects instant messengers (ICQ, MSN). 
 * Provides proactive protection from unknown threats. 

Preventative Protection


 * Scans operating system and application for vulnerabilities. 
 * Analyzes and closes Internet Explorer vulnerabilities. 
 * Disables links to malware sites. 
 * Global threat monitoring (Kaspersky Security Network). 

Advanced Protection & Recovery


 * Can be installed on infected computers. 
 * Self-protection from being disabled or stopped. 
 * Restores correct system settings after removing malicious software. 
 * Tools for creating a rescue disk. 

Data and Identity Theft Protection


 * Disables links to phishing web sites. 
 * Blocks all types of keyloggers. 

Usability


 * Automatic configuration during installation. 
 * Wizards for common tasks. 
 * Visual reports with charts and diagrams. 
 * Automatic or expert user modes. 
 * Automatic database updates.
feature_bullets: Advanced antivirus software with maximum spyware protection to guard against viruses, Trojans, and worms, spyware and adware, rootkits, identity theft and phishing attacks
Scans files, email, and Internet traffic; protects instant messengers
Analyzes and closes Internet Explorer vulnerabilities; Disables links to malware sites / phishing sites
Protects from unknown threats; blocks all types of keyloggers
Automatic database updates; free technical support
